# thind-js
 JS framework to develop web apps with Webflow frontend


## Installing 

```bash
npm i thind-js
```

## Using thind-js

1. In JS file import `thind`

```js
import { Thind } from 'thind'; // Importing the module
```
2. Construct `Thind` function with your global attribute

```js
const thind = new Thind({ attribute: 'data-my-el' });
```

3. Use available `thind` functions like this
```js
const element = thind.getElement('customerinput');
const elements = thind.getElements('customerinput', document.querySelector('.parent'));
webflow.disableFormSubmission(document.querySelector('form'));
```
